entry.title: Monday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. Ice fog patches this morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
